snippet.title: Arcus Launch Trailer (Indie game from LWMedia) - REUPLOAD
snippet.description:
Arcus is a freeware story focused fantasy action game created by a single developer, out now!!

Thank you everyone who stuck with the project over the 5 long years of development. What started out as a 3 month long project where I had no idea what I was doing exploded into this game that I'll cherish for the rest of my life. I appreciate each and every one of you.

REUPLOAD EDIT: The trailer was originally part of a channel that has since been abandoned (I have merged my professional account into this personal account). I am uploading the trailer here so it is properly archived before I delete the other channel.

► Download on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1479960/Arcus/
► Download on Google Play Store: https://tinyurl.com/y84c3za6
► Download on Itch.io: https://b0tster.itch.io/arcus
► Follow on twitter: https://twitter.com/b0tster
► Subscribe to this channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtivWy9ARYojIlFZhuvJT0Q
